{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2503.24185v1", "title": "Adding the constant evasion and constant prediction numbers to
  Cichoń's maximum", "summary": "Let $\mathfrak{e}^\mathsf{const}_2$ be the constant evasion number, that is,
the size of the least family $F\subseteq{}^{\omega}2$ of reals such that for
each predictor $\pi\colon {}^{<\omega}2\to 2$ there is $x\in F$ which is not
constantly predicted by $\pi$; and let $\mathfrak{v}_2^\mathsf{const}$ be the
constant prediction number, that is, the size of the least family $\Pi_2$ of
functions $\pi\colon {}^{<\omega}2\to 2$ such that for each $x\in{}^{\omega}2$
there is $\pi\in\Pi_2$ that predicts constantly $x$. In this work, we show that
the constant evasion number $\mathfrak{e}_2^{\mathrm{cons}}$ and the constant
prediction number $\mathfrak{v}_2^\mathsf{const}$ can be added to Cicho\'n's
maximum with distinct values.", "main_category": "math.LO", "categories": "math.LO", "published": "2025-03-31T15:02:26Z"}
